title: Create a super-minimal configset
description:
As per discussion on the mailing list, it would be a good idea to create a super-minimal example.

A prototype is available at https://github.com/arafalov/solr-presentation-2018-may/tree/master/configs/initial

It can be improved by maybe another type (text), using parameter set and documentation pointing out the missing pieces and where to find them in the reference guide.
